explains: adj. 持久的；长期的，持续时间长的

sentences.en: There could quite possibly be long-lasting effects.
sentences.cn: 这很可能会产生长期的影响。

sentences.en: The HFMR AN/PRC-150 offers secure voice and data communications, networking and long-lasting battery life.
sentences.cn: HFMR AN/PRC-150 提供安全的语音和数据通信、网络和持久的电池寿命。

sentences.en: One of the long-lasting effects of the infection is damage to a valve in the heart.
sentences.cn: 感染的其中一个长期后果是使心脏的一个瓣膜受损。
